meanings.definition: Of or relating to a part of a cell that is smaller or more specialized than a cell as a whole.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the subcellular structures under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The subcellular components play a crucial role in cell function.
meanings.sent3: The tiny subcellular world is like a hidden treasure waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was so subcellular, she noticed things others overlooked.
meanings.sent5: The subcellular intricacies of the cell amazed the students in biology class.

meanings.definition: Located or occurring within a cell.
meanings.sent1: The subcellular organelles work together to maintain cell function.
meanings.sent2: Subcellular processes are essential for cell survival.
meanings.sent3: The subcellular party was so exclusive, even the nucleus couldn't get in!
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like subcellular messengers, traveling within his mind.
meanings.sent5: The subcellular activities within the cell were like a bustling city under a microscope.
